name: Call2Success
0:
”Alexa open Call two Success”
”set prayer reminder”
”delete prayer reminders”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call two success
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill will automatically notify the user when it is time to pray based on their geographic location. It will also prompt the user if they would like to play an audio file the athan once the initial reminder has been completed. In the help menu, the user has the option to silence or mute any prayer notifications. The skill will also send a reminder to the individuals mobile phone.
